title: 9 Benefits of Travelling to a Tropical Destination in the Summer
text: Top 5 Most Romantic Caribbean Suites of   The entire property of Jade Mountain at Anse Chastanet is designed with romance in mind. Every single room of the boutique hotel has its outer wall completely open for an unobstructed view of St. Lucia’s Pitons and the Caribbean Sea. The “Galaxy” Infinity Pool Sanctuaries are on the highest level of Jade Mountain and promise the most breathtaking panoramic views. But you won’t find any phones, televisions or radios here, their deliberate absence from the rooms allows guests to truly relax and enjoy their stay. Rates start at USD 2,350 per night. (Photo Courtesy of Jade Mountain) Located on Low Cay Beach on the north coast of Jamaica, Golden Eye is a mix of enchantment and seclusion. Its one-bedroom villas open directly onto the beach or Golden Eye’s four-acre signature lagoon. Each of the hotel's 17 rooms feature a large porch and indoor/outdoor bathroom which increases the allure of these suites. Did we mention that Ian Fleming wrote the character for 007 while staying at this resort? We all know James Bond has a way with the ladies, so his seductive ways may even rub off on you during your stay. Rates start at USD 975 per night. (Photo Courtesy of Golden Eye) From boutique hotels to this large luxury property, you can be sure that the romance isn't lost in the size upgrade. The colonial-inspired Fairmont Southampton on beautiful Bermuda has awesome views of the Atlantic and an award-winning golf course. Their Duplex Suites are perfect for a romantic trip for two. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by soft, pastel décor and three floor-to-ceiling French windows which reach up to the bedroom loft to provide ocean views from the comfort of a four-poster bed. The marble bathroom's Jacuzzi tub and the balcony also offer panoramas, adding to the magnetism of the suite. Rates for suites start at USD 1,340 per night. (Photo Courtesy of Fairmont Southampton) With stunning sea-views of Bermuda’s Castle Harbor, the Rosewood Tucker’s Point Villa Suites embody the breezy enchantment of the British seaside. The room boasts luxurious decorative details, beautiful artwork, five-fixture bathrooms, marble showers, and stand-alone deep soaking tubs. The 12 exclusive one-bedroom villas are each independent from the hotel’s Manor House and open to an expansive balcony with a waterfront view and present a more secluded ambiance. Rates for the Villa Suites start at USD 1,750 per night. (Photo Courtesy of Rosewood Tucker's Point) Belmond La Samanna sits on the idyllic western shore of St. Martin. From sparkling waters to picturesque sunsets, there’s always a touch of love in the air at La Samanna. The Baie Royale Suite is the resort’s honeymoon suite; it offers views of pristine sands and azure waters of Baie Longue beach. The accommodation includes a luxurious bedroom, oversized bathroom, living room, private terrace and three balconies with a covered sitting area and plunge pool. The French-style décor and relaxed tropical ambiance create an unrivalled romantic experience. Terrace suite rates start at USD 1,195. (Photo Courtesy of Belmond La Samanna)  Share
